snippet.title: AMazing TD: Steam Early Access Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
AMazing TD is a deep strategy game that focuses on building mazes and on competitive Tower Defense game play.

Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1140030/AMazing_TD/

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AMazingTD/


Every map have distinct randomized tiles, which makes every maze you create unique.
Multiplayer!
Clash against other clever players in fair real time battles.You and your opponent play on a mirrored map, where you can effect your opponent's maze. You and your adversary can even maze together in a mutual area. Design superior mazes than your challenger. And aim to reach higher damage than your foe in this vivid tower defense mode.
Singleplayer!
Score more damage than anyone else on your skill level. Leaderboard's map reset weekly or daily. After reset new pseudo random maps generated and you are rewarded based on your rank and damage.
Features:

    Endless maps, games only end when you run out of lives
    Immense variation of random generated maps
    Up to 16x wave speed up, no more boredom between waves
    Real-time 1v1 PvP multiplayer tower defense
    Daily and Weekly global leaderboards with unique maps
    Comparative playback of other player's game
    Skill level progression
    Unsurpassed TD game design with many unique map properties
    Steady development, there is lot more to come!


AMazing TD is the legitimate successor to other cogent tower defense games like Entropy TD, Random TD and Split TD.
